languages.text: {n}Смотреть на борьбу между надеждой и терзающими ее сомнениями на лице псайкера весьма увлекательно. Впрочем, вам прекрасно известно чем эта борьба закончится.{/n}
{n}It is rather entertaining to observe the battle between hope and doubt play out on her face. But then again, the outcome is already known to you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Смотреть на борьбу между надеждой и терзающими ее сомнениями на лице псайкера весьма увлекательно. Впрочем, вам прекрасно известно чем эта борьба закончится.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}It is rather entertaining to spectate the battle between hope and doubts on her face. But then again, the outcome is already known to you.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}It is rather entertaining to spectate the battle between hope and doubts on her face. But then again, the outcome is already known to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}It is rather entertaining to observe the battle between hope and doubt play out on her face. But then again, the outcome is already known to you.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}她脸上的希望与怀疑不断地彼此斗争，观察这场斗争的过程相当有趣。不过，你早就知道结果了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is rather entertaining to observe the battle between hope and doubt play out on her face. But then again, the outcome is already known to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}她脸上的希望与怀疑不断地彼此斗争，观察这场斗争的过程相当有趣。不过，你早就知道结果了。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Es muy entretenido observar la batalla entre la esperanza y la duda en su expresión, aunque, realmente, ya sabes cuál será el resultado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is rather entertaining to observe the battle between hope and doubt play out on her face. But then again, the outcome is already known to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es muy entretenido observar la batalla entre la esperanza y la duda en su expresión, aunque, realmente, ya sabes cuál será el resultado.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Es ist recht unterhaltsam, den Kampf zwischen Hoffnung und Zweifel zu beobachten, der sich auf ihrer Miene abspielt. Andererseits weißt du längst, wie er ausgehen wird.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is rather entertaining to observe the battle between hope and doubt play out on her face. But then again, the outcome is already known to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es ist recht unterhaltsam, den Kampf zwischen Hoffnung und Zweifel zu beobachten, der sich auf ihrer Miene abspielt. Andererseits weißt du längst, wie er ausgehen wird.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}希望と疑念の戦いが彼女の表情の中で繰り広げられる様に、あなたはむしろ高揚感を覚える。しかし一方で、結果はすでに見えていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is rather entertaining to observe the battle between hope and doubt play out on her face. But then again, the outcome is already known to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}希望と疑念の戦いが彼女の表情の中で繰り広げられる様に、あなたはむしろ高揚感を覚える。しかし一方で、結果はすでに見えていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le combat entre l'espoir et le doute qui se lit sur son visage vous amuse un moment, mais vous connaissez déjà son issue.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is rather entertaining to observe the battle between hope and doubt play out on her face. But then again, the outcome is already known to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le combat entre l'espoir et le doute qui se lit sur son visage vous amuse un moment, mais vous connaissez déjà son issue.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yüzündeki umut ve şüphe kırıntılarının savaşını izlerken eğleniyorsun. Öte yandan sonucu zaten biliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is rather entertaining to observe the battle between hope and doubt play out on her face. But then again, the outcome is already known to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yüzündeki umut ve şüphe kırıntılarının savaşını izlemek eğlenceli geliyor. Fakat sonucu zaten biliyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
